A result-driven Data Scientist with extensive experience in data analysis, machine learning, and 
disease mapping. Proficient in Python, R, and SQL, with a strong focus on spatiotemporal data 
analysis, geospatial data visualization, and predictive modelling. Adept at leveraging statistical 
methods and machine learning algorithms to extract actionable insights from complex datasets. 
Specializes in disease modelling, public health surveillance, and guiding evidence-based health 
interventions.
Current a PhD student at Federal University of Technology, Akure (FUTA), Nigeria, Statistics department under the Biostatistics and Spatial Statistics research team.
